bsc#1125314.comment: rules dynamically generated by our own polkit profile tooling
default rule shipped by polkit, allows uid 0 to do everything

bsc#1125438.comment: allows systemd-networkd to set hostname and timezone from DHCP information
allows systemd-networkd to set hostname and timezone from DHCP information

bsc#984817.comment: allows the wheel group to operate in a passwordless fashion. this is an exception at the moment since normally we don't follow the special meaning of 'wheel'

bsc#1125314.comment: allows members of the group libvirt to manage libvirt without password

bsc#1125432.comment: Allows gnome-initial-session to configure the system after input is collected from the user
